Author: SPRK Team
Title: [ANN][ICO] SPRK: SparkleCOIN ICO on the way. Buy from online shops with crypto!
Body: WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN   Intro:  Meet SparkleCOIN, the next generation of cryptocurrency. It was conceived, designed, and developed by business-minded veterans using the latest technologies for business.  Unlike the previous generation of cryptocurrencies which mainly focused on the technical aspects of the blockchain technology, SparkleCOIN, along with the economic ecosphere around it, focuses on how to use these technologies to transact in the real-world. By doing so, we are able to use these tools to create an entirely new economy with tremendous potential for growth.  Main feature is its infrastructure, which enables the use of SparkleCOIN in the real world transactions for goods and services, and for conversion into fiat currencies. It enables users to buy products and services from major online stores like Amazon, Walmart, Target and others using cryptocurrency. It is also backed by $5 worth of diamonds per every coin, making it a solid investment.  Other features include VCoin Mall - a peer-to-peer e-tailer which directly connects customers with retailers and other e-tailers; and VCoin Exchange - immediate trading platform for SparkleCOIN to be traded with Bitcoin, Ether, and US Dollars.  It's also minable for reward, and you will be able to mint it.  Token sale has already begun and will close on the 21st of December – just in time for Christmas shopping via the VCoin Mall!  Please read our materials for a deeper dive into the concept:    Roadmap:  Nov 2017 - Launch VCoin Exchange to allow SparkleCOIN Transactions Q4 2017 – Launch VCoin Mall in time for the holiday shopping season driving demand and price of SparkleCOIN Q1 2018 – Allow virtually any online shopping site to use VCoin Exchange’s payment gateway to start accepting SparkleCOIN and other accepted cryptocurrencies  Below is the sale structure and tokens issued:  SparkleCoin ICO: 4,000,000; Pre-ICO supporters: 200,000; Pre-ICO work in trade: 200,000; Sparkle Coin, Inc. 100-year operations prefunding: 36,525,000; VCoin Exchange 100-year operations prefunding: 9,131,250; VCoinMall.com 100-year operations prefunding: 9,131,250.  Team behind the SparkleCOIN:  Victor Wang - CEO David Chen - CFO Mehmet Oguz - VP Sales Paul S - CIO Travis Redding - CTO Michael Beavers - COO Satyen Chavdaa - Controller  Feel free to get in touch with any questions you might have here or on our Telegram channel - SPRK Support Team is happy to help, and inform you about rewards and special offers!

Author: SPRK Team
Title: [ANN][ICO] SPRK: SparkleCOIN ICO on the way. Buy from online shops with crypto!
Body: To provide a safety net for early purchasers, each Sparkle Coin is backed by $5 worth of certified diamonds procured through established diamond suppliers. Once the price of Sparkle Coin reaches $25 per coin, the backing is no longer required because of the acquired value of Sparkle Coin.  "Sparkle Coin anticipates the transaction volume from purchases with these e-tailers to be significant, thereby exponentially increasing the trading volume,demand, and possibly even the price of Sparkle Coin."  Soft and Hard cap you can find in our White paper at link http://storage.sparklecoin.com/papers/Sparkle%20Coin%20White%20Paper.pdf
